channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: Federal court blocks Trump tariffs. And, why Hungary inspires American conservatives

item.title: American doctors look to relocate to Canada to avoid the Trump administration
item.description: Canada has seen a surge of American doctors seeking to move north in the months since President Donald Trump returned to the White House.

item.title: How safe is the food supply after federal cutbacks? Experts are worried

item.title: Turkey to fine airline passengers who stand up before plane stops
item.description: Those who unbuckle before the "fasten seatbelt" sign is turned off face a fine, aviation authority says.

item.title: Landslide from partial glacier collapse buries 90% of Swiss village

item.title: $14 billion in clean energy projects have been canceled in the US this year, analysis says
item.description: A new analysis finds that more than $14 billion in clean energy projects in the U.S. have been canceled this year.

item.title: French MPs vote to scrap low-emission zones
item.description: Critics said the zones hit those who cannot afford less-polluting vehicles the hardest.

item.title: What to know about the federal court that blocked Trump's tariffs
item.description: The Court of International Trade has dealt a serious blow to President Trump's tariff policy. Here's what to know about the court.

item.title: What happens now after Trump suffers major blow to economic policy?
item.description: The Trump administration said it would appeal against the ruling shortly after it was announced.

item.title: How to qualify for student loan forgiveness now
item.description: Student loan forgiveness is changing fast. Here's how to qualify now, and what to do if you don't make the cut.

item.title: Israel announces major expansion of settlements in occupied West Bank
item.description: The biggest such move in years is condemned by the Palestinian presidency as a "dangerous escalation".
